title.rendered: Alutech Aluminium And Glass Builds a New Factory in Jebel Ali

content.rendered:
SONY DSC

Alutech is today synonymous with stunning architectural achievements such as the Burj Al Arab and the Emirates Towers, which undoubtedly have placed Dubai on the world map.

With further prestigious buildings like The Gate , Century Tower, Capricorn Tower, Dubai Marina and current projects such as Salam Tower, The Precincts, Moalla Tower and Marina Tower , we are cementing steadily our leadership in the aluminium, glass and stainless steel industry.

Through our strategy of proficient associations and a continued policy of investment in new technologies and production methods, we intend to consolidate our reputation for excellence and customer satisfaction by expanding our operations and production facilities.

The recently acquired 15,000m2 industrial land in Jebel Ali will accommodate the largest aluminium factory (built-up area 10,000m2) in the Middle East and house the Engineering Department, assembly factory, bonding hall and cladding division.

Full operation is scheduled during the first quarter of 2005 in order to cope with the recently acquired orders and forthcoming mega-projects.
